item.description:
We love Tom's work and think this is a very cool program! Please come out and join us to see this amazing photographers work!

In 2004 Tom Rettig came to Worcester Living magazine and the Telegram & Gazette after working at the Valley News in Lebanon N.H., Journal Tribune in Biddeford ME and the Columbus Dispatch in Columbus OH. In 2000 Tom Rettig won New England Photographer of the Year awarded through the National Press Photographers Association. Tom's work can be seen at www.rettigphoto.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Photographer Tom Rettig of Worcester Living Magazine to speak at 7HCC
